actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the construction of a lock and dam project on the Mississippi River near Alton, Ill.  and Mo.

summary.text: Authorizes the construction of a lock and dam project on the Mississippi River, Alton, Illinois and Missouri by the Corp of Engineers in accordance with plans approved by the Secretary of the Army on July 14, 1969. Provides that nothing in the Act shall be construed as authorizing a twelve-foot channel above Alton, Illinois. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as are necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the construction of a lock and dam project on the Mississippi River near Alton, Ill.  and Mo.
